instructions:
Parboil the flowerets 4 to 5 minutes or till just fork tender. Do not overcook. Drain and spread on a paper
towel. When cool toss in a bag containing the mixed flour, salt and pepper to coat. Melt butter in a large
frying pan and fry the flowerets over medium low heat for about 10 minutes or until light golden brown on
all sides. Serves 4. 
*(Rev. 4/8/94)*
name: Cauliflower Fried In Butter
